parameters.ChatRoomEntertainment: 1: Entertainment scenario where users need to frequently switch the user role.

parameters.Education: 2: Education scenario where users want smoothness and stability.

parameters.GameStreaming: 3: High-quality audio chatroom scenario where hosts mainly play music.

parameters.ShowRoom: 4: Showroom scenario where a single host wants high-quality audio.

parameters.ChatRoomGaming: 5: Gaming scenario for group chat that only contains the human voice.

parameters.IOT: 6: IoT (Internet of Things) scenario where users use IoT devices with low power consumption.

parameters.MEETING: 8: Meeting scenario that mainly contains the human voice.
